name: d20: Sweet Roll Club - A Visual Novel
name_original: d20: Sweet Roll Club - A Visual Novel
description:
Entering high school makes many problems for the withdrawn and dreamy Tomoko: classmates consider her strange, lessons suddenly become difficult, and with the school festival coming she has to join some afterschool club as soon as possible...

But Tomoko has no problems with fantasy. Magic can be brought from anywhere by the power of her imagination as the school yard turns into a deep forest, the library becomes a sinister warlock chamber, school halls transforms into ancient catacombs... Only it's difficult to find another girl who likes childish games in high school.

One day Tomoko finds out that there are a few school girls who enjoy posing as brave warriors, powerful wizards and knightly paladins. Together they decide to open the role-playing board games club where they have free rein over their dreams for magic and adventures.

Genres: ADV, shoujo-ai, ecchi, comedy, everyday life.



  • chibi-styled characters;
  • partly animated backgrounds;
  • plenty of CG-arts with animation;
  • original soundtrack with impressive opening;
  • combat system;
  • the alignment system;
  • three endings, all depends on final worldview of the main character: Lawful End, Chaotic End, Neutral End;
  • the roll of a twenty-sided dice determines the success of the gamer's actions;
  • music room.


TomokoJun 26, 16 years old
Blood Type: A
Main character. First grade high school student. Quiet girl who spends all her free time in her fantasies. She tries to study hard but without success and she has difficulties in her social life because of autism spectrum disorder. She always wears big pointy hat, the gift of her the only childhood friend. She plays in the club as the Wizard.

Blood Type: AB

MasterJul 31, 23 years old
